00026 #include "lpc17xx_wdt.h"

00038 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00039 #define MCB_LPC_1768
00040 //#define IAR_LPC_1768
00041 
00042 //Watchodog time out in 5 seconds
00043 #define WDT_TIMEOUT     5000000
00044 
00045 
00046 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00047 uint8_t menu1[] =
00048 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00049 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00050 " Watch dog timer interrupt (test or debug mode) demo \n\r"
00051 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00052 "\t - Core: Cortex M3 \n\r"
00053 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 -  115200 bps \n\r"
00054 " Use WDT with Internal RC OSC, interrupt mode (test only), timeout = 1 seconds \n\r"
00055 " To generate an interrupt, after interrupt WDT interrupt is disabled immediately! \n\r"
00056 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00057 uint8_t info1[] = "BEFORE WDT interrupt!\n\r";
00058 uint8_t info2[] = "AFTER WDT interrupt\n\r";
00059 
00060 __IO Bool wdt_flag = FALSE;
00061 __IO Bool LED_toggle = FALSE;
00062

00064 void WDT_IRQHandler(void);

00066 void print_menu(void);
00067 void LED_Init (void);

00069 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00070 /*********************************************************************/
00075 void WDT_IRQHandler(void)
00076 {
00077         // Disable WDT interrupt
00078         NVIC_DisableIRQ(WDT_IRQn);
00079         // Set WDT flag according
00080         if (wdt_flag == TRUE)
00081                 wdt_flag = FALSE;
00082         else
00083                 wdt_flag = TRUE;
00084         // Clear TimeOut flag
00085         WDT_ClrTimeOutFlag();
00086 }
00087 
00088 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00089 /*********************************************************************/
00094 void print_menu(void)
00095 {
00096         _DBG(menu1);
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*********************************************************************/
00104 void LED_Init (void)
00105 {
00106 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768 /* Using LED2.2 for testing */
00107         //turn on LED2.2
00108         FIO_SetDir(2,(1<<2),1);
00109         FIO_SetValue(2,(1<<2));
00110 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768) /* Using LED1 (P1.25 for testing */
00111         FIO_SetDir(1,(1<<25),1);
00112         FIO_ClearValue(1,(1<<25));
00113 #endif
00114 }
00115 
00116 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00117 /*********************************************************************/
00122 int c_entry(void)
00123 {
00124         uint32_t delay;
00125         // Init LED port
00126         LED_Init();
00127 
00128         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00129          * – 115200bps
00130          * – 8 data bit
00131          * – No parity
00132          * – 1 stop bit
00133          * – No flow control
00134          */
00135         debug_frmwrk_init();
00136 
00137         // print welcome screen
00138         print_menu();
00139 
00140         /* Install interrupt for WDT interrupt */
00141         NVIC_SetPriority(WDT_IRQn, 0x10);
00142         // Set Watchdog use internal RC, just generate interrupt only in 5ms if Watchdog is not feed
00143 
00144         // Init WDT, IRC OSC, interrupt mode, timeout = 5000000 us = 5s
00145         WDT_Init(WDT_CLKSRC_IRC, WDT_MODE_INT_ONLY);
00146 
00147         /* Enable the Watch dog interrupt*/
00148         NVIC_EnableIRQ(WDT_IRQn);
00149 
00150         while (1)
00151         {
00152                 if (wdt_flag == FALSE){ //before WDT interrupt
00153                         _DBG_(info1);
00154                         _DBG_("Press '1' to enable Watchdog timer...");
00155                         while(_DG !='1');
00156                         // Start watchdog with timeout given
00157                         WDT_Start(WDT_TIMEOUT);
00158                         while(wdt_flag == FALSE)
00159                         {
00160                                 _DBD32(WDT_GetCurrentCount()); _DBG_("");
00161                         }
00162                 } else { // after WDT interrupt
00163                         _DBG_(info2);
00164                         _DBG_("LED is blinking...");
00165                         while(wdt_flag == TRUE)
00166                         {
00167                                 if (LED_toggle == FALSE)
00168                                 {
00169 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00170                                         //turn on LED
00171                                         GPIO_SetValue(2,(1<<2));
00172 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00173                                         GPIO_ClearValue(1,(1<<25));
00174 #endif
00175                                         LED_toggle = TRUE;
00176                                 }
00177                                 else
00178                                 {
00179 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00180                                         //turn off LED
00181                                         GPIO_ClearValue(2,(1<<2));
00182 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00183                                         GPIO_SetValue(1,(1<<25));
00184 #endif
00185                                         LED_toggle = FALSE;
00186                                 }
00187                                 //delay
00188                                 for(delay = 0; delay<1000000; delay ++);
00189                         }
00190                 }
00191         }
00192         return 1;
00193 }
00194 
00195 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00196 int main (void)
00197 {
00198         return c_entry();
00199 }
